general.name: Christian Siber, MSc
general.description: A software developer who loves every aspect of digital product creation. From problem solving, finding innovative solutions, refining user stories, designing stunning user interfaces, creating awesome user experiences, to building sustainable software architectures and implementation.

experience.title: Creator
experience.description: Designing and implementing a digital foosball ranking system. Made use of QR codes and NFC tags to let players quickly connect to shared match sessions. Ported the frontend application to iOS and Android using Cordova.

experience.title: Lead Developer
experience.description: Setting up and implementing projects in the public and medical sector as a fullstack developer, and technical lead. Integrating the IoT Hub in an existing ecosystem to connect devices around the world.

experience.employer: s IT Solutions AT Spardat GmbH
experience.title: Application Development .NET
experience.description: Working on various fintech-applications for the Erste Group Service Center as well as every Erste Bank branch.

experience.title: Software Engineer ASP.NET
experience.description:
Developing features for an international and highly scalable betting platform.
Implementating multiple REST and SOAP services that stub various third party services for testing. Responsible for the architecture and design of a website to monitor and configure those services.
